dict.acceptation: 习惯，惯例；海关，关税；经常光顾；[总称]（经常性的）顾客；

sent.orig: Custom Field Six and six custom attributes to facilitate expansion and custom.
sent.trans: 六个自定义字段和六个自定义属性，方便扩展和自定义。

sent.orig: Persisted is one custom and the giving up is one custom also.
sent.trans: 坚持是一种习惯，放弃也是一种习惯。

sent.orig: When all these one custom, then had happy has also become one custom and inevitably.
sent.trans: 当这一切都了一种习惯，那么拥有幸福也就成了一种习惯和必然。

sent.orig: But there was another common custom among savages-the custom of killing female children immediately after birth.
sent.trans: 但在蒙昧人中间广泛流行的女孩出生后立即杀死的习俗，则可能有关系。

sent.orig: Embroidery and folk-custom supplement each other, it is one of folk-custom activity serious content.
sent.trans: 刺绣与民俗相辅相成，是民俗活动中的一个重要内容。
